website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are looking for a Nixon watch to wear with career looks, casual styles, or black-tie affairs, this gorgeous watch is definitely a bold statement piece.
pros: Sports the classic chronograph style with three subdials and an attractive all gold-tone finish that is a great look for everything from daily wear to formal occasions
Features a date window and double-clasp closure
cons: Quite large and heavy, and may not work for men with thin wrists
Rare reports of the chronograph mechanisms malfunctioning

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money?..
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a head turner wherever you go, even more so than my gold 51-30. Feels solid, shines bright in light, & is somewhat a chick magnet. The price you pay vs what's on Zumiez is a steal, knowing for a solid fact that these watches surprising aren't fake. If this is your style, and you have high standards for your personal image, I would recommend this to you from both an aesthetically pleasing and price conscious perspective. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: This watch is probably a fake.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be a nice watch but alas it wasn’t true. Almost immediately the black started to fade from the band. Then. I went to the ocean. Maybe submerged about 2-3 feet and wham. Water inside the watch, then it stopped working. Buyer beware. I wouldn’t buy this watch again, I’m just afraid it was a cheap knock off.
customer_reviews.author: M. Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Great statement piece
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Husband already had the gold model. If you haven't seen this watch in person, it is huge and heavy. My husband is a bigger guy who likes a little falsh so this is right up his alley. Nixon is also great at fixing your watch if your into any issues (found this out on an old model they were able to fix right up).
customer_reviews.author: A. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Classic watch, great for every occasion
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. I purchased for my boyfriend, who has many Nixon watches. This is his new favorite! It’s well weighted, great quality, and goes with just about anything. It can be dressed up or down. The only issue we had with it was figuring out how to use the minute hand on the chrono part of the watch. The seconds and hours were fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: manly sturdy weight. Legit and real
customer_reviews.text: Fiance likes it, manly sturdy weight. Legit and real. Silver is nice , wish it came in all silver like the all gold, because the white makes it look plastic or like a paper background. He gets compliments so overall its a good watch.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Old Battery. Died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Watch was perfect when received but I purchased in June it is September and the battery already died. I have many Nixon watches I have bought in stores and have not had batteries died until at least a year Or two. I am pretty disappointed I have to taken my husbands new watch to get a new battery after Only 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Literally perfect. It's so big and flashy I get compliments everywhere I go. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: G5 baby, big d!ck swinging, obnoxious.
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for a halloween costume to be les grossman, and its now my favorite watch. This watch is beyond ridiculous. Obnoxious if you will, a bit heavy, but i like a large watch. its LOUD(fashion wise), it is seldom i wear it and people don't comment on it. Its awesome. oh yea, and its quality built and functions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Filingeri

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Nixon watch. I love the camo and it fits the same as the others. My main concern with this one is that the hands and dial are very difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: gregory duty

customer_reviews.title: You wont be dissapointed. Its classy and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: awesome watch. this watch is big like 2" big but if you have big wrist its perfect. nixon did a great job making this a bold and manly watch.it definitely gets compliments everytime i wear it. only cons which arent that big of deal is that the chrono/time functions have to be unscrewed if you want to use them. purpose is so water doesnt get in when you go swimming. one last thing is that the chrono second hand reset to the 58minute mark so it was confusing that you might have to calibrate it maually to get it to stop at the 12 o'clock position which is explained in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: purchased this watch as a Christmas gift for my husband. He lived it! The watch has good weight to it. Very well made. Authentic! The gunmetal brushed wristband is of a lighter tone and goes well with a dressy or casual look. The face is large and looks great on both smaller and large wrists. My husband is 6'2" and 250lbs. This looks great on him.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: Bad-ass watch
customer_reviews.text: Manly, heavy, really cool band. And I love that the bezel is kind of translucent camo....only thing is, not sure what the function is of the bezel, because there's no mark on it....?
customer_reviews.author: B. Sims

customer_reviews.title: The time can be easily seen. I would defining recommend this watch for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my boyfriend for Christmas and I fit him perfectly. The watch was delivered on time for the holidays. I was hesitant to buy the watch due to reviews saying the black background and black hour and minute hands made it hard to read the time, however, that was not the case. The time can be easily seen. I would defining recommend this watch for that special guy in your life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery
customer_reviews.text: Came with a dead battery. The corona virus shut down all businesses. I have no idea if the watch is broke or will work
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: Great product, from a looks stand-point but the second hand does not move. Based on other reviews I'm not the only one to encounter this. Perhaps it's an error on my part but with no directions, it's hard to know for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Ziemann

customer_reviews.title: Tough, reliable, and functional
customer_reviews.text: Another great functional design from Nixon. These watches are bulletproof and make a statement! I love these watches for their reliability and not having to “baby” them. I can take the kids surfing, to the pool, or wear to a formal meeting... and dont have to stop and switch watches or worry about them failing. Great products in the 51-30 and 48-20 models.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Well made, timeless, good looking watch! Bought this for my husbands birthday, he loved it and his coworker liked it so much he ordered one for himself!
customer_reviews.author: K.Zaruba

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monster for my wife. She wanted one from the first time she saw it. Geez, it's huge but she gets compliments everywhere she goes with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely a head turner...
customer_reviews.text: This watch definitely isn't for everyone, but I have lost count of the amount of compliments I have received while wearing it. Girls, guys, young, older... all types of people seem to compliment me on my watch. It stand out well against a dark colored outfit, and it doesn't feel too heavy even for someone with smaller wrists like myself. I honestly haven't figured out all the functions it has with the other knobs, but it works perfectly for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: By far the best deal
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a great deal But I didn’t get what I wanted so I had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: RTuneS916

customer_reviews.title: My husband is a huge Nixon fan, he's had ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a huge Nixon fan, he's had the gold version for a long time, always receives compliments on it, he wanted this black one to add to his collection, he loves this watch. The gold on black looks really sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: BIG MAN'S WATCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy it. I added this to my growing collection of Nixon watches and just love it. I'm 6'4 and decent built so the 51-30 look like a normal 42mm watch would look like on the average person. It's a big watch for a larger man or perfect if you want your watch to be noticed from across the room.
customer_reviews.author: LRG T

customer_reviews.title: Big and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s absolutely beautiful but my boyfriend said it’s too large for him and he doesn’t want the “flashy” stuff. Sorry to return it. Good deal too.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but it is bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: i knew this watch was huge, i expected it to be huge, but it was still way bigger than i ever thought Ive only had it for one day, so im sure it will grow on me, but despite its larger than expected size, i still love this thing I mean, anyone buying a 51-30 is probably wanting a huge watch anyways, i know i was. Just remember, its probably even bigger than you expect.
customer_reviews.author: bsm428

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: It says it's unisex but it's obvious in size it's a men's watch but for a woman I have a bigger wrist and hands so it actually is very becoming on me. I get constant compliments, mostly from men of course as they are more watch connoisseur's, but never the less it's beautiful. It's heavy and the dial on the opposite side is smart. I've only had it for a few months so we'll see if the color fades like one reviewer has said. Till then, this will be the only watch I wear!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good long lasting watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it. Large face looks good on a big wrist. The gun metal is stylish. He had the silver for over a decade. He swears it lasts forever. Can be complicated to change time he just brings it to the jeweler and let’s them do it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann N.

customer_reviews.title: Brand New Mint Condition
customer_reviews.text: A great investment! The watch arrived in mind condition and without a scratch on it. I purchased this for my husband around Christmas time. It was worth every penny the watch cost just to see the look of surprise on my husband face had when he opened the box. He polishes it every day and takes it out on special occasions. He received a lot of compliments when he wears it. I am planning on buying him another Nixon watch for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra  Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Poor design concept
customer_reviews.text: The watch is OK. HOWEVER, you can't see the black on black sweep hands. Poor design concept. I called Nixon customer support to see if they could replace (even on my dime) with different color arms. I was told no - they don't do customization. I went to my local watch repair shop - had the black paint remove to shinny metal. I am very happy with the watch now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a head-turner!
customer_reviews.text: My Girlfriend bought me this watch for Christmas, and let me tell you, it's quite the "Wrist-full" If you don't get it tightly fitted it will just flop all over the place. It's a lot heavier than I would think as the band is Stainless Steel. I gave it only 4 stars because as another commenter said, for such a pricey watch, one would expect a higher-end movement. Overall great watch though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Most versatile
customer_reviews.text: My ex wife bought me this watch many years ago and i lost it after we broke up. I just bought it again. New beginnings! I have the gun metal, white ( rubber ), and the matte gold one. Love them all but this one is the most versatile with any outfit. I get compliments on it all the time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Rugged look
customer_reviews.text: This was my very first Nixon watch and I'm so stoked to have bought this specific one. The matte black with the camo compliments each other very well and it goes well with any look.
customer_reviews.author: surfahjo808

customer_reviews.title: best watch ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Strong watch, looks very classy yet sporty. This is for the guy with class and style. I am a watch guy and various brands. Nixon is by far the best quality watch I have owned. If there is another brand please tell me. Muffin.top.love20@gmail.com Every guy should own a nixon. I have 3!!! -amazon Ray
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Ray

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous NIXON!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch, saw it all over the place for clost to $500, found it on Amazon for almost half that! Many compliments on this bad boy!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: it was high quality material loved that is was very heavy but that is what ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend, it was high quality material loved that is was very heavy but that is what Nixon watches are for diving and such. Very beautiful watch, if you look online on Nixon, those watches go for well over $500. Will buy another soon.
customer_reviews.author: brittany franks

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. The battery died super quickly though so it most likely was running the whole time before it was shipped to us though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't like that the back of the watch is scratched already ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that the back of the watch is scratched already upon opening and the box was torn when I open the envelope. Why would something so expensive come in an envelope? Even my cat food comes boxed?
customer_reviews.author: kim e. pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Favorite watch I own
customer_reviews.text: The two aspects that stand out the most that I love about this watch are the weight and size. It's a thick and durable watch which adds some weight to it and the large face makes for a bold fashion statement.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice watch. I looked at it briefly. It was a gift for a good friend. The package arrived in time.
customer_reviews.author: barstowkid

customer_reviews.title: I be looking fancy
customer_reviews.text: It can get scratch so be careful with your watch.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: I love the watch, but
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch, but it should had came with instructions on how to change battery and how to take off links. it literally just came with only with instructions on how to set time, and cautions on what to do when underwater. If only, if it had instructions about everything about the watch i would a gave it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Huang

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch⌚️
customer_reviews.text: This watch was exactly as described looks great has some weight to it.. Would highly recommend this to anyone looking to buy it.. Received it sooner than expected which made it even better..
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Watch for Price
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend fell in love with this in the store but in gold, which I neglected to remember upon ordering. He actually loved it so much he decided to keep it and maybe get the gold in addition to this. For the price, the quality really can't be beat. The heft of the watch case is impressive and the design and execution is absolutely gorgeous. He gets compliments wherever we go. The watch has a high polish finish, which is beautiful, but requires a daily wipe down to keep looking pristine. Overall, A+.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Mo

customer_reviews.title: ... are only on the inside of the glass NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: It was suppose to be GUNMETAL not gray and there is a film on the inside of the glass when the sun hits it right you see a film and wipe mark that are only on the inside of the glass NOT HAPPY CAMPER
customer_reviews.author: carmine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Nixon watch and this watch like my others including The Banks, The Mayor, The Player are all quality made. I was surprised by the fact that this watch was priced way lower than other retailers out there. I have gotten many compliments on this watch already. The watch is quite large 51mm, but this the type of watch that I like. I have fairly large wrists and it compliments it well.
customer_reviews.author: Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great price!  Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and another Nixon in the collection! Hundreds below what my local retailer wanted for the identical watch! Nothing but comments on all my Nixons.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nourse

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch but did not come with extra link to band to expand for proper fit. Disappointing and looking toward manufacturer to obtain one if possible. Fits a bit snug as is.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Thewatch itself is really nice and legit
customer_reviews.text: Surprised on how fast it got delivered. The amazon box was a lil dented on the corner but the air bubbles inside the package protected the actual Nixon box. The watch itself is really nice and legit. I was afraid of the watch being fake but did alot of research with the watch and is definitely a Nixon watch.
customer_reviews.author: gloria garcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent service!
customer_reviews.text: I love Rose Gold. This watch gets so many compliments -- it's beautifully made, and so vivid. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Radestock

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the watch today and it was very nicely packed. It was covered in plastic as if it came straight feom the factory. Plus there was japanese kitkat inside the box to celebrate the joy ;) haha .. thank you so much for all this & lots of love from us all
customer_reviews.author: Racha

customer_reviews.title: HE LOVED IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: He LOVED the watch. Might end up a little too flashy but will find out in next few days!!! The watch looks AMAZING though!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great statement
customer_reviews.text: Solid watch paired with pretty good movement. This watch will get looks and is a favorite among many collections. Great size for a larger wrist and it feels like you actually have a time piece worth while on display.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: great shipping material with a genuine hand written thank you ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, great shipping material with a genuine hand written thank you note. Very nice and a joy doing business with them. I got exactly what I wanted at a great price! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Katz

customer_reviews.title: its a nice watch but its big
customer_reviews.text: its a nice watch but its big. recommend for bigger people with thicker wrist. not for skinny people unless your into that style. it heavy and seems legit overall its nice stands out a lot
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: NIXON 51-30
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this watch is everything I expected. The craftsmanship of this watch is unique and luxury.
customer_reviews.author: darroncoates

customer_reviews.title: Great legit stylish watch
customer_reviews.text: Great legit stylish watch....sure, you could go to the mall and buy a big fat watch from just about anywhere but people who know can tell the difference...I wore the Nixon on a recent trip to Vegas and dealers and bartenders were constantly complimenting me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Received in record time!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch as a Xmas gift for my husband. It was so beautiful and it arrived super fast given how late I ordered before the holidays. My husband is extremely happy with the watch and wears it everyday!! He gets lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lefevre

customer_reviews.title: Not a good watch at all
customer_reviews.text: If I can return this watch, I will definitely do so. The watch isn't described well on amazon. Sad! Just wasted my money.i wish someone with amazon will allow me to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: luqman

customer_reviews.title: When it came in the mail we both fell in love with it
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend have this watch in gold and wanted the black. When it came in the mail we both fell in love with it. He wore it twice and the 2 small crowns fell off and we cant seem to fit it back on. Totally disappointed in this product. Waste of money! 2 stars because it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not new as described, came used.
customer_reviews.text: If you're ordering from the time store do not expect a new watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Showstopper
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so excited about his Christmas gift. It's a large watch for a big guy and he gets many compliments. Pairs beautifully with his tungsten wedding band I got from Amazon... plus I saved about $150.
customer_reviews.author: zina abraham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding gift for hubby!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding gift for my hubby and it was the absolute right choice! Looks just as I expected, matches his ring perfectly, and most importantly - he loves it! Shipped quickly and arrived very nicely packaged. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W.

customer_reviews.title: These are great watches, I have five 51-30's in different colors ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great watches, I have five 51-30's in different colors and styles. Well made and damn near indestructible. My only issue is having to send it to the factory for service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: It's a very big watch. U will like it if it you like huge watches
customer_reviews.author: phillip

customer_reviews.title: You would be a fool for not investing in this watch!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend just got me this watch for my birthday! I LOVE THIS WATCH TO DEATH! This is my second 51-30... My first one being the gold and black Nixon 51-30 Chrono and this watch just BLEW MY MIND when I saw it in person and put it on for the first time! I honestly can't put into words how amazing this watch is though! :) If you're looking for a Nixon 51-30 or a rose gold watch in general... YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED WITH THIS WATCH!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Skalicky

customer_reviews.title: My son will love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch as a gift for our son He loves watches and previously admired this one. I have not given it to him yet, but he will love it. The watch arrived early with everything advertised.
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: Great products.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the watch. I only buy from jomashop whether it be their website, eBay or Amazon. Jomashop usually has what I'm looking for. Great deals and great warranty plans no hassle
customer_reviews.author: Israel Virrueta

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on. Cant wait for order my next
customer_reviews.text: I received my watch fast and on time. It was everything i was looking for and more. Looks great on. Cant wait for order my next Nixon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time Waits For No One!
customer_reviews.text: My friend loved this watch for his birthday! Nothing beats a handsome man with a quality watch!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Soto

customer_reviews.title: MAGNIFICENT!
customer_reviews.text: I am a "watch fiend' and own some moderately priced to expensive watches. This is my first NIXON and I am VERY impressed with the build quality and "presence" it commands!
customer_reviews.author: "BIG MARCUS"

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Baller status. I can't wear mine because too many people stop me and ask about my watch. It draws a lot of attention and does cause neck snapping. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: SofTop

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch. Good quality. The face is nice and big. Be cautious if you have a big hand, we had to get the extra link installed at the watch shop cause it was a little too snug for his liking. Other then that... good buy
customer_reviews.author: S. T

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most beautiful watches I own. Heavy, big, and strong. Just the way I like them. Nixon's last forever, never break. Best prices are on Amazon. I get compliments everytime I wear a Nixon watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxworld

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch. Very large! High quality. Would definitely like to own another Nixon. The 51-30 series is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely what I expected. Authentic Nixon watch. Will ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely what I expected. Authentic Nixon watch. Will soon buy another color from them.
customer_reviews.author: cain pineda

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome. Very substantial
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome. Very substantial. Chrono functions are sadly nonfunctional. Be careful, the screw downs can be easily unscrewed to the point of pulling the push needle completely out. Was on a plane trying to do an elapsed time function & managed to easily unscrew one of the needles all the way out. Seals were still on the needle and I was able to get it back in and marginally functional but I will not be taking this watch underwater ever. Chrono is marginally functional and it's probably not waterproof anymore. It's a glam, fashion watch now.
customer_reviews.author: Spotondl

customer_reviews.title: Can't  beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Watch is great looking get a lot of compliments nice but gor the price.
customer_reviews.author: willie wooodson

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite watches. Lots of compliements. It is large and very heavy, but I like that about it.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Nixon 51-30
customer_reviews.text: Saved quite a bit of money buying this through Jomashop. I love the watch and have since bought another in a different color. I must get 3-4 people commenting on how much they like it weekly. It is very good quality and looks like a lot more expensive of a watch then it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan P.

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit Among High Schoolers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch as a gift for my grandson. He loved it and received a lot of compliments when he wore it back to school. It can be worn everyday and is very easy to read. If 17 year olds opinions matter-----this watch ROCKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L. Turnamian

customer_reviews.title: This watch is huge and heavy but i love it. It's not really for regular wear
customer_reviews.text: This watch is huge and heavy but i love it. It's not really for regular wear, it's more like a club watch. Catches a lot of attention.
customer_reviews.author: Ari312

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch but a little difficult to read
customer_reviews.text: Awesome look but very difficult to see the hands due to the colors.

customer_reviews.title: Unique watch
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved it. He had never seen a camo Nixon so he is stoked
customer_reviews.author: Kim Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Nixon of all
customer_reviews.text: My gf bought me this watch about a year ago and it's by far my favorite watch. I own 4 Nixon watches and this ones is my fav. Watch stands out a lot. This watch gets a lot of compliments. It's big so if u have a small wrist u might want to try it on at a store near u that carries it. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Luis Avina

customer_reviews.title: beautiful watch. Get compliments everyday on it
customer_reviews.text: Big, beautiful watch. Get compliments everyday on it. Should have gotten a long time ago.

customer_reviews.title: Love Nixon ... The watch, not the president.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, looks amazing.. The picture on Amazon here serves it no justice. This is the nicest Nixon I've purchased to date. Colors are awesome, many many compliments ..
customer_reviews.author: Gigantor

customer_reviews.title: This watch is awesome. Nice big faced watch that is built very ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome. Nice big faced watch that is built very well and my husband absolutely loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bennett

customer_reviews.title: This watch looks amazing on! My fiancé has a big wrist and ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks amazing on! My fiancé has a big wrist and it was a perfect fit and he gets a lot of compliments on it every time he wears it
customer_reviews.author: Abby Shimota

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking watch...Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased multiple Nixon Watches for my husband, and have to say most of them are of poor quality, especially considering the price. Dial pins on the side fall out. Also, don't be fooled by the waterproof claim - a quick dip in the pool did one of these in. Getting these watches serviced anywhere is a problem since the parts are all proprietary. If you send it into Nixon, it's a minimum of $150 or more depending on the problem you are trying to fix. Of course, manufactures warranty doesn't cover any issues. They look really nice right out of the box though...
customer_reviews.author: Pelageya

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning watch!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much nicer in person than it even is in the pictures. Fast delivery and gorgeous product!! My son is thrilled with his Christmas gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Arbogast

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: no move after 1 month. go to the store and they said no more buttery .
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Yin

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking watch but it is way too big and heavy. For a generic japan quartz movement (citizen makes the movement) they are way over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. It's very big which means most places ...
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. It's very big which means most places won't have the tools to remove a link if you need it smaller. You will have to pay to get it removed at a watch shop. Still it is highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch... in the beginning!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch! The black does rub off after some time/wear though. Nixon said that's classified as 'normal wear' and didn't offer to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch dead
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch... Only problem was that they sent it to me with a dead battery. I was disappointed that I had to take the watch to a repair shop and pay the money to get the watch working. I called the vendor and they told me that they would reimburse me up to 10$ for the battery. Unfortunately it is the inconvenience not the $ that dissapointed me
customer_reviews.author: tim barber

customer_reviews.title: Big and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: What an absolute gem, this watch is. If big is your thing then this is certainly the way to go. Nixon make a fantastic watch, well below the cost of those european brands. It is quite heavy initially however with a few wears, you don't notice the weight. Easy to read, easy to operate and easy to wear, it goes with everything. A1 service via Amazon. I have nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lando

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Eye catcher a little heavy but otherwise a must have for anyone who likes watches with a large face.
customer_reviews.author: Andrae Moore

customer_reviews.title: Large and in charge.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this watch. It is large, impressive, heavy, all features that i was looking for in a new watch.
customer_reviews.author: packeroni

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this watch. The only con I could say is the face is very dark which makes it a little difficult for me to see the hands
customer_reviews.author: Bob W

customer_reviews.title: It really catches the eye and looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hubs. It really catches the eye and looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY NIXON
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch and so does everyone one else......thx for the response !!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaypeedee

product_meta.title: Nixon 51-30 Chrono. 100m Water Resistant Men’s Watch (XL 51mm Watch Face/ 25mm Stainless Steel Band)
product_meta.description:
MAKING THE LITTLE STUFF BETTER.
We make the little things better. The stuff you have that isn't noticed first, but can't be ignored. We pay attention to it. We argue about it. We work day and night to make the little things as good as it can be, so when you wear it, you feel like you've got a leg up on the rest of the world.


SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY.
Nixon's Supplier Code of Conduct ensures all of our suppliers are adhering to socially responsible business practices, meaning all products are produced under lawful, humane, and ethical conditions.

ACCESSORIES THAT REFLECT WHO WE ARE & THE LIFE WE LIVE.
Fueled by adventures far and wide, and sometimes by those that happen just down the street, we deliver products that meet your needs. We travel the globe to experience life; the journey to get there takes shape in the things we create.


EXPRESS YOURSELF. 
When you wear a watch, you deserve to have something that reflects your entire package. You may not know how to say it, but you've got something to say and we're here to provide that voice.






ABOUT NIXON

We make the little stuff better. The stuff you have that isn't noticed first, but can't be ignored. We pay attention to it. We argue about it. We work day and night to make the little stuff as good as it can be, so when you wear it, you feel like you've got a leg up on the rest of the world. 

We believe that you warrant a lot of respect. When you choose to wear a watch, put on your headphones, or select a wallet to hold your hard earned cash, you deserve to have something that reflects your entire package. You may not know how to say it, but you've got something to say and you can't slap on an off-the-shelf piece and consider yourself you. That's why in ’98 we started Nixon and that's why all these years later, we're still here. 

Nestled comfortably against the Pacific Ocean in Southern California and with offices tucked neatly next to some of the best spots in Europe, Australia, and Asia you'll find Nixon people doing what we do. We make accessories to reflect who we are and the life we live. We travel all corners of the globe to experience life and it is through these explorations, the people we meet and the journey to get there that takes shape in the things we create. 

It started as a frustration at a lack of quality watches that simultaneously do the talking for you and has since grown into a group of athletes, rock stars, retailers, and dedicated loyalists that bring Nixon products to market. Fueled by adventures far and wide and often sometimes by those that happen just down the street we deliver products that meet your needs in various high-stress work and play environments. It is through our dedicative team’s perspectives that we contribute to a single unified expression: team-designed, custom-built accessories for a life well lived. Welcome to Nixon.






PRODUCT DETAILS
 *  User Manual [PDF ] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :5.91 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 10.2 Ounces
 * Item model number :A083502
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :November 15, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Nixon Inc.
 * ASIN :B00A1XQH4E

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #184,888 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #6 inSurf, Skate & Street Wrist Watches 
    *  #1254 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #35 inMen's Contemporary & Designer Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars532 ratings

You may not know how to say it, but you've got something to say and you can't slap on an off-the-shelf piece and consider yourself you. That's why in ’98 we started Nixon and that's why all these years later, we're still here. 

Nestled comfortably against the Pacific Ocean in Southern California and with offices tucked neatly next to some of the best spots in Europe, Australia, and Asia you'll find Nixon people doing what we do. We make accessories to reflect who we are and the life we live. We travel all corners of the globe to experience life and it is through these explorations, the people we meet and the journey to get there that takes shape in the things we create. 

It started as a frustration at a lack of quality watches that simultaneously do the talking for you and has since grown into a group of athletes, rock stars, retailers, and dedicated loyalists that bring Nixon products to market. Fueled by adventures far and wide and often sometimes by those that happen just down the street we deliver products that meet your needs in various high-stress work and play environments. It is through our dedicative team’s perspectives that we contribute to a single unified expression: team-designed, custom-built accessories for a life well lived. Welcome to Nixon.
feature_bullets: Brushed stainless steel watch featuring round dial with chronograph sub-dials, large Arabic numeral indices, and decorative hands
51mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Three-link stainless steel band featuring fold-over clasp with Micro Adjust closure
Water resistant to 200 m (660 ft): In general, suitable for professional marine activity and serious surface water sports, but not scuba diving.
